mean_cn: v.使臣服，使顺从（读作/səbˈdʒɛkt/）；  n.科目；实验对象
mean_en: "an area of knowledge that is studied in school; a thing or person that is being discussed
sentence: This man wants everyone to be subject to him.
sentence_trans: 这个男人妄图所有人都臣服于他。
word_etyma: sub在…下面 + ject投掷，扔 → 扔下去 → 服从的，扔下去让大家讨论的主题 → subject主题
